mapper.select: SELECT b.inqry_id as "inqryId", b.inqry_ref_id as "inqryRefId", b.inqry_group_ord as "inqryGroupOrd", b.inqry_title as "inqryTitle", b.inqry_cntnt as "inqryCntnt", b.inqry_pwd as "inqryPwd", b.inqry_regist_date as "inqryRegistDate", b.inqry_update_date as "inqryUpdateDate", b.inqry_delete_yn as "inqryDeleteYn", b.inqry_mber_id as "inqryMberId", a.rn FROM ( select rownum rn, inqry_id, inqry_ref_id, inqry_group_ord, inqry_title, inqry_cntnt, inqry_pwd, inqry_regist_date, inqry_update_date, inqry_delete_yn, inqry_mber_id from (select tb_inqry.* from tb_inqry where inqry_group_ord = 0 order by inqry_id desc ) ) A INNER JOIN tb_inqry B on A.inqry_id = B.inqry_ref_id WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY b.inqry_ref_id desc, b.inqry_group_ord

SELECT i.inqry_id as "inqryId", i.inqry_ref_id as "inqryRefId", i.inqry_group_ord as "inqryGroupOrd", i.inqry_title as "inqryTitle", i.inqry_cntnt as "inqryCntnt", i.inqry_pwd as "inqryPwd", i.inqry_regist_date as "inqryRegistDate", i.inqry_update_date as "inqryUpdateDate", i.inqry_delete_yn as "inqryDeleteYn", i.inqry_mber_id as "inqryMberId", f.inqry_file_id as "inqryFileId" FROM tb_inqry i LEFT JOIN tb_inqry_file f on i.inqry_id = f.inqry_file_inqry_id WHERE inqry_id=#{inqryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_inqry (inqry_id, inqry_ref_id, inqry_group_ord, inqry_title, inqry_cntnt, inqry_pwd, inqry_regist_date, inqry_update_date, inqry_delete_yn, inqry_mber_id) VALUES (inqry_seq.nextval, #{inqryRefId}, 0, #{inqryTitle}, #{inqryCntnt}, #{inqryPwd}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), null, 'N', #{inqryMberId})

INSERT INTO tb_inqry_file (inqry_file_id, inqry_file_name, inqry_file_size, inqry_file_ext, inqry_file_path, inqry_file_regist_date, inqry_file_update_date, inqry_file_delete_yn, inqry_file_inqry_id) VALUES (#{inqryFileId}, #{inqryFileName}, #{inqryFileSize}, #{inqryFileExt}, #{inqryFilePath}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'), NULL, 'N', #{inqryFileInqryId})
mapper.select: SELECT LAST_NUMBER AS inqryFileId FROM user_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'INQRY_SEQ'
